title: UK will detail post-Brexit immigration proposal 'as and when we're ready' - spokesman
text:
February 6, 2018 / 12:38 PM / Updated 4 hours ago UK will detail post-Brexit immigration proposal 'as and when we're ready' - spokesman Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
LONDON (Reuters) - Britain will set out its proposals for a post-Brexit immigration system when it is ready, Prime Minister Theresa May’s spokesman said on Tuesday. 
“We will bring forward proposals on the future immigration system as and when they’re ready,” the spokesman told reporters. Reporting by Elizabeth Piper, editing by William James
